Although the RCP scenarios incorporate a combination of socioeconomic parameters such as population and income
31, 32 , it can be argued that a given emission pathway defined by each of the RCP scenarios may be reached under a wide variety of socioeconomic conditions
33 . The RCP8.5–SSP1 combination is not feasible
34 ; therefore, projected premature mortality burden is discussed only for the remaining nine RCP–SSP combinations.
